channel.title: FunOrb AutoSpammer
channel.description:
Hey, I've been a lurker here for a few years. Decided to try my hand at SIMBA, seeing as there were no FunOrb auto-spammers that I could find. I think mine came out well, aside from the fact that I'm too much of a noob to include a GUI. :|
Anyways, script's attached, enjoi.
PS: I'm thinking of trying to make a quick-chat spammer, but as you know....I'm a noob. In short, any help I could get with the mouse/bitmap/colour finding functions would be extremely appreciated. ^_^

item.title: FunOrb AutoSpammer
item.dc:creator: @Enigma1 Enigma_
item.description:
@Enigma1 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:366297”][quote author=Enigma_ link=topic=462494.msg3385999#msg3385999 date=1288464370]
@Davidi2

I would have earlier, but I’ve been quite busy as of late.
[/quote]You still haven’t asked for specific help…[/quote]

This script isn’t my top priority, at the moment, the upcoming contest on my YouTube channel is.

Besides, they seem to have updated the client since I wrote this.
Before, when you pressed [tab], the client would act as if you’d switched focus, supposing you were in the lobby.

I’ll just dump the “lobby” line, and update the script.

Read full topic

item.title: FunOrb AutoSpammer
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Then you should give instructions for the user. Or use a simple bitmap search to see if the user is in the lobby or in game.

But also, no one is going to want to spam in game, it’s only useful in the lobby.

Read full topic

item.title: FunOrb AutoSpammer
item.dc:creator: @Enigma1 Enigma_
item.description:
@Enigma1 wrote:

@Davidi2

//SendKeys ('SPAM' + Chr(13)); //Lobby Is for the lobby only.

//SendKeys (Chr(9) + 'SPAM' + Chr(13)); //In-Game And is for in-game.

That’s why they’re labeled, you’re supposed to un-comment the one you need to use.

Read full topic

item.title: FunOrb AutoSpammer
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[code=pascal]program RepeatUntilExample;

//AutoSpammer By ENIGMA (Enigma_ On Mopar)
//For Free Use, Give Credit Where Credit Is Due.
//If You Like The Script, Consider Spamming “Spam Thanks To ENIGMA”
//For A Few Seconds Before Spamming Your Own Messages.

procedure RepeatExample;
var
loopNumber: Integer;
begin
repeat
//—v That’s The Amount Of Time (milliseconds) To Wait Before Looping.
wait(75);
//—v That’s The First Line You Want To Spam.

//SendKeys (‘SPAM’ + Chr(13)); //Lobby
//SendKeys (Chr(9) + ‘SPAM’ + Chr(13)); //In-Game
//—v That’s The Time (milliseconds) To Wait Before Spamming The Second Line.
//—v That Just Displays The Ammunt Of Times The Script Has Spammed.
Writeln(’------------------------------’);
Inc(loopNumber);
Writeln(‘You Have Spammed ’ + IntToStr(loopNumber) + ’ Times’);
Writeln(’------------------------------’);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ');
//--------------------v You Can Set A Certain Number Of Messages To Spam.
until(loopNumber = -1);
//--------------------^ Leave At “-1” To Spam Indefinitely.
end;
//–v Ignore That Shiz.
begin
ClearDebug;
RepeatExample;
end.
[/code]

Normally you don’t comment the functional lines of code if you want to make your program work =/

Read full topic
